Gabriel ThamLevel 8. WizardUpdated on 29 Jun 2019When its reinvested they would announce quantity of shares reinvested.So you are effectively buying X shares at $1.50 without transaction fees.
So now you just add these and average out with your main holdings the same way as if you buy from broker but without any fees.2 comments0

You dont count it in as a loss. It is already reflected in the DRIP, you purchased lesser shares with that amount.
